title: Risen Academy Recruitment Platinum+ (For QUT Brisbane LAN)
body:
Hey guys!
Risen will be putting together a platinum - diamond LOL team to participate in the upcoming QUT LOL tournament taking place over May 2nd and 3rd. The tournament has a $4PP entry fee or $20 per team and there will be a $250+ prize pool.

We will be recruiting over the next week and require players in all roles, we will be holding trials once we have enough. The only prerequisite is that you must have current residence in or close to Brisbane as it will be hosted at QUT Gardens Point. You will also need a significant amount of spare time as we will be training through scrims and flex often. If you think you might be interested in competing feel free to shoot us a message!
P.S. This isn't going to be a one tournament wonder team, this will become the official Risen Academy roster.

Here are some more details in regards to that tournament:
https://www.facebook.com/events/270112187271203/

Here is the link to our application for a position:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeQCDgX8sdztc7beqJ-21s571pOoqdNs3wIXojb_6O86m3JNQ/viewform?fbclid=IwAR0xR5PGSmaLjofXL88Zr72OojBbZeSAxVphpN1pe3COQd_cKeGA2wESUdA

Thankyou!
